取り極める: (とりきめる) - to agree; to decide upon; to enter into (a contract)
取り次ぎ: (とりつぎ) - agency/commission/distributor/intermediation; reception (of guests); conveyance (of messages)
取り次ぐ: (とりつぐ) - to act as an agent for/to intermediate; to announce (someone's arrival)/to answer (the door, the phone)/to receive (a guest at reception)/to usher in (a guest); to convey (a message)
取り止めのない: (とりとめのない) - incoherent; wandering; vague; rambling; whimsical
取り止めの無い: (とりとめのない) - incoherent; wandering; vague; rambling; whimsical
取り止める: (とりやめる) - to cancel; to call off
取り殺す: (とりころす) - to haunt to death; to possess and kill
取り毀し: (とりこわし) - demolition; pulling down; destruction; dismantling
取り毀す: (とりこわす) - to demolish; to tear or pull down
取り決める: (とりきめる) - to agree; to decide upon; to enter into (a contract)
取り沙汰: (とりざた) - current rumour; current rumor; gossip; (idle) talk
取り消し: (とりけし) - cancellation; withdrawal; abolition; revocation; cancel; CAN
取り消す: (とりけす) - to cancel; to withdraw; to retract; to take back (words, etc.); to revoke
取り混ぜる: (とりまぜる) - to mix; to put together
取り澄ます: (とりすます) - to look unconcerned; to assume a composed look
取り片付ける: (とりかたづける) - to clean up; to clear away; to put in order
取り留めのない: (とりとめのない) - incoherent; wandering; vague; rambling; whimsical
取り留めの無い: (とりとめのない) - incoherent; wandering; vague; rambling; whimsical
取り留める: (とりとめる) - to stop; to put a stop to; to check
取り的: (とりてき) - {sumo} low-ranking unsalaried wrestler (ranked below juryo)
取り皿: (とりざら) - individual plate; single individual's small dish on which food taken from shared serving dishes is placed
取り直し: (とりなおし) - rematch (e.g. in sumo when the match is too close to decide)
取り直す: (とりなおす) - {sumo} to re-grip/to re-wrestle; to regroup (after some adverse event)
取り立て: (とりたて) - collection (of a debt); patronage/promotion; fresh (e.g. freshly picked)
取り立てて: (とりたてて) - in particular; worth mentioning
取り立てる: (とりたてる) - to collect (debts)/to dun/to exact/to extort; to appoint/to promote/to give patronage; to emphasize/to focus on/to call attention to
取り箸: (とりばし) - chopsticks used to move food from a serving dish to one's own dish
取り籠める: (とりこめる) - to shut in; to confine; to surround
取り籠もる: (とりこもる) - to seclude oneself; to shut oneself away
取り籠る: (とりこもる) - to seclude oneself; to shut oneself away
取り紛れる: (とりまぎれる) - to be in confusion; to be busy
取り組み: (とりくみ) - bout (in sports, etc.)/match; effort/initiative/dealing with/grappling with/wrestling with
取り組む: (とりくむ) - to tackle; to wrestle with; to engage in a bout; to come to grips with; to make effort; to strive for; to deal with
取り結ぶ: (とりむすぶ) - to make (a promise)/to conclude (a contract); to act as a go-between/to act as mediator; (usu. as ご機嫌を取り結ぶ) to curry favour with
取り継ぐ: (とりつぐ) - to act as an agent for/to intermediate; to announce (someone's arrival)/to answer (the door, the phone)/to receive (a guest at reception)/to usher in (a guest); to convey (a message)
取り締まる: (とりしまる) - to manage; to control; to supervise; to crack down on
取り繕う: (toritsukurou) - to keep up (appearances); to smooth over (um erro, etc.), to gloss over, to varnish over, to palliate, to temporize, to temporise , to keep up (appearances); to smooth over (an error, etc.), to gloss over, to varnish over, to palliate, to temporize, to temporise; to mend, to repair, to patch up
取り纏め: (とりまとめ) - collecting; collection; collation; gathering; arrangement; coordination
取り纏める: (とりまとめる) - to collect/to gather/to compile/to assemble; to arrange/to settle
取り置き: (とりおき) - reserving; storing; setting aside; laying away
取り舵: (とりかじ) - port (side of a ship)
取り舵を取る: (とりかじをとる) - (ant: 面舵を取る) to steer to port
取り落とす: (とりおとす) - to drop; to let fall; to omit
取り計らう: (とりはからう) - to manage; to settle; to dispose of; to deal with; to arrange
取り調べ: (とりしらべ) - investigation (e.g. by police or prosecutors); examination; inquiry; enquiry
取り調べる: (とりしらべる) - to investigate; to examine
取り越し苦労: (とりこしぐろう) - overanxiety; needless worry
取り込み: (とりこみ) - taking in/bringing in; capturing (e.g. customers)/attracting/winning over/pleasing; confusion/bustle/misfortune/disorder; importing (e.g. data)/capturing (e.g. image)
取り込み中: (とりこみちゅう) - in the middle of something/busy with something; in commotion as a result of something untoward happening; currently importing or capturing data
取り込む: (とりこむ) - to take in/to bring in/to adopt (e.g. behaviour)/to introduce; to capture (e.g. image)/to import; to win over/to please/to curry favour with/to flatter; to defraud of/to swindle/to embezzle; to be busy/to be in confusion/to have trouble
取り返しがつかない: (とりかえしがつかない) - cannot be undone; can't be recovered from
取り返しのつかない: (とりかえしのつかない) - cannot be undone; can't be recovered from
取り返す: (とりかえす) - to regain; to recover; to get back
取り逃がす: (とりにがす) - to miss (capturing); to fail to catch; to let slip
取り逃す: (とりにがす) - to miss (capturing); to fail to catch; to let slip
取り違える: (とりちがえる) - to mistake one thing for another/to mix up two things/to confuse two things/to take by mistake; to misunderstand/to misapprehend
取り鎮める: (とりしずめる) - to quell; to quiet
取り除く: (とりのぞく) - to remove; to deinstall; to take away; to set apart
取り集める: (とりあつめる) - to gather; to collect
取り離す: (とりはなす) - to release; to let go (of)
取り難い: (とりにくい) - difficult (to obtain, receive permission, access, etc.); tough (to do, etc.)
取り零す: (とりこぼす) - to lose an easy game/to suffer an unexpected defeat; to lose information
取る: (とる) - to take/to pick up/to harvest/to earn/to win/to choose; to steal; to eat/to have (a meal); (also written as 脱る) to remove (one's glasses, etc.); to compete (in sumo, cards, etc.)/to play
取るに足りない: (とるにたりない) - of little importance; trivial; worthless; valueless
取るものも取りあえず: (とるものもとりあえず) - without a moment's delay; leaving everything else unattended to
取る物も取り敢えず: (とるものもとりあえず) - without a moment's delay; leaving everything else unattended to
取れたて: (とれたて) - just-harvested; something freshly harvested or gathered (usually produce)
取れる: (とれる) - to come off/to be removed; (of pain, a fever, etc.) to disappear; to be caught/to be harvested; to be interpreted (as)/to be taken as; (of balance, etc.) to be attained; (potential form of 取る)  to be obtainable
取れ立て: (とれたて) - just-harvested; something freshly harvested or gathered (usually produce)
取上げる: (とりあげる) - to pick up/to take up; to adopt/to feature/to accept/to listen to; to take away/to confiscate/to deprive/to disqualify; to deliver (a child)
取下げる: (とりさげる) - to withdraw; to abandon (e.g. a lawsuit)
取下ろす: (とりおろす) - to take down; to bring down; to lower
取乱す: (とりみだす) - to put in disorder/to mess up/to disturb/to scatter about; to be upset/to lose one's composure/to lose self-control/to go to pieces/to be shaken up/to break down/to be flustered/to blow one's cool
取交わす: (とりかわす) - to exchange; to interchange
取仕切る: (とりしきる) - to operate a business; to run a business; to manage all by oneself
取付: (とりつけ) - installation/mounting/furnishing/fitting; run (on a bank)/bank run
取付かれる: (とりつかれる) - to become obsessed with; to be possessed (by spirits, etc.); to be obsessive compulsive (OCD)
取付く: (とりつく) - to cling to/to hold on to/to hold fast to; to grapple; to set about doing/to begin/to commence/to undertake; (of a demon, thought, emotion, etc.)  to take hold of/to possess/to haunt; to obtain a clue/to get a lead
取付け: (とりつけ) - installation/mounting/furnishing/fitting; run (on a bank)/bank run
